pound.name: pound
pound.flavor_text: The foe is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

karate-chop.name: karate-chop
karate-chop.flavor_text: The foe is attacked with a sharp chop. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

double-slap.name: double-slap
double-slap.flavor_text: The foe is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

comet-punch.name: comet-punch
comet-punch.flavor_text: The foe is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

mega-punch.name: mega-punch
mega-punch.flavor_text: The foe is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

pay-day.name: pay-day
pay-day.flavor_text: Numerous coins are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. Money is earned after battle.

fire-punch.name: fire-punch
fire-punch.flavor_text: The foe is punched with a fiery fist. It may leave the target with a burn.

ice-punch.name: ice-punch
ice-punch.flavor_text: The foe is punched with an icy fist. It may leave the target frozen.

thunder-punch.name: thunder-punch
thunder-punch.flavor_text: The foe is punched with an electrified fist. It may leave the target with paralysis.

scratch.name: scratch
scratch.flavor_text: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the foe to inflict damage.

vice-grip.name: vice-grip
vice-grip.flavor_text: Huge, impressive pincers grip and squeeze the foe.

guillotine.name: guillotine
guillotine.flavor_text: A vicious, tearing attack with pincers. The foe will faint instantly if this attack hits.

razor-wind.name: razor-wind
razor-wind.flavor_text: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit the foe on the second turn. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

swords-dance.name: swords-dance
swords-dance.flavor_text: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

cut.name: cut
cut.flavor_text: The foe is cut with a scythe or a claw. It can also be used to cut down thin trees.

gust.name: gust
gust.flavor_text: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the foe to inflict damage.

wing-attack.name: wing-attack
wing-attack.flavor_text: The foe is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

whirlwind.name: whirlwind
whirlwind.flavor_text: The foe is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

fly.name: fly
fly.flavor_text: The user soars, then strikes on the second turn. It can also be used for flying to any familiar town.

bind.name: bind
bind.flavor_text: A long body or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the foe for two to five turns.

slam.name: slam
slam.flavor_text: The foe is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

vine-whip.name: vine-whip
vine-whip.flavor_text: The foe is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

stomp.name: stomp
stomp.flavor_text: The foe is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.

double-kick.name: double-kick
double-kick.flavor_text: The foe is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

mega-kick.name: mega-kick
mega-kick.flavor_text: The foe is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

jump-kick.name: jump-kick
jump-kick.flavor_text: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

rolling-kick.name: rolling-kick
rolling-kick.flavor_text: The user lashes  out with a quick, spinning kick. It may also make the target flinch.

sand-attack.name: sand-attack
sand-attack.flavor_text: Sand is hurled in the foe’s face, reducing its accuracy.

headbutt.name: headbutt
headbutt.flavor_text: The user attacks with its head. It may make the foe flinch. To find Pokémon, hit trees.

horn-attack.name: horn-attack
horn-attack.flavor_text: The foe is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

fury-attack.name: fury-attack
fury-attack.flavor_text: The foe is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

horn-drill.name: horn-drill
horn-drill.flavor_text: The foe is stabbed with a horn rotating like a drill. The foe instantly faints if it hits.

tackle.name: tackle
tackle.flavor_text: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the foe with its whole body.

body-slam.name: body-slam
body-slam.flavor_text: The user drops onto the foe with its full body weight. It may leave the foe paralyzed.

wrap.name: wrap
wrap.flavor_text: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the foe for two to five turns.

take-down.name: take-down
take-down.flavor_text: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the foe. It also damages the user a little.

thrash.name: thrash
thrash.flavor_text: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

double-edge.name: double-edge
double-edge.flavor_text: A reckless, life- risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

tail-whip.name: tail-whip
tail-whip.flavor_text: The user wags its tail cutely, making the foe less wary. The target’s Defense stat is lowered.

poison-sting.name: poison-sting
poison-sting.flavor_text: The foe is stabbed with a poisonous barb of some sort. It may also poison the target.

twineedle.name: twineedle
twineedle.flavor_text: The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.

pin-missile.name: pin-missile
pin-missile.flavor_text: Sharp pins are shot at the foe in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

leer.name: leer
leer.flavor_text: The foe is given an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The target’s Defense stat is reduced.

bite.name: bite
bite.flavor_text: The foe is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

growl.name: growl
growl.flavor_text: The user growls in an endearing way, making the foe less wary. The target’s Attack stat is lowered.

roar.name: roar
roar.flavor_text: The foe is scared off, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

sing.name: sing
sing.flavor_text: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the foe into a deep slumber.

supersonic.name: supersonic
supersonic.flavor_text: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

sonic-boom.name: sonic-boom
sonic-boom.flavor_text: The foe is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

disable.name: disable
disable.flavor_text: For several turns, this move prevents the foe from using the move it last used.

acid.name: acid
acid.flavor_text: The foe is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

ember.name: ember
ember.flavor_text: The foe is attacked with small flames. The target may also be left with a burn.

flamethrower.name: flamethrower
flamethrower.flavor_text: The foe is scorched with an intense blast of fire. The target may also be left with a burn.

mist.name: mist
mist.flavor_text: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

water-gun.name: water-gun
water-gun.flavor_text: The foe is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

hydro-pump.name: hydro-pump
hydro-pump.flavor_text: The foe is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

surf.name: surf
surf.flavor_text: It swamps the entire battlefield with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.

ice-beam.name: ice-beam
ice-beam.flavor_text: The foe is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

blizzard.name: blizzard
blizzard.flavor_text: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the foe. It may also freeze the target solid.

psybeam.name: psybeam
psybeam.flavor_text: The foe is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also leave the target confused.

bubble-beam.name: bubble-beam
bubble-beam.flavor_text: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.

aurora-beam.name: aurora-beam
aurora-beam.flavor_text: The foe is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. It may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

hyper-beam.name: hyper-beam
hyper-beam.flavor_text: The foe is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.

peck.name: peck
peck.flavor_text: The foe is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

drill-peck.name: drill-peck
drill-peck.flavor_text: A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill.

submission.name: submission
submission.flavor_text: The user grabs the foe and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.

low-kick.name: low-kick
low-kick.flavor_text: A powerful low kick that makes the foe fall over. It inflicts greater damage on heavier foes.

counter.name: counter
counter.flavor_text: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

seismic-toss.name: seismic-toss
seismic-toss.flavor_text: The foe is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

strength.name: strength
strength.flavor_text: The foe is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. It can also be used to move boulders.

absorb.name: absorb
absorb.flavor_text: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

mega-drain.name: mega-drain
mega-drain.flavor_text: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

leech-seed.name: leech-seed
leech-seed.flavor_text: A seed is planted on the foe. It steals some HP from the foe to heal the user on every turn.

growth.name: growth
growth.flavor_text: The user’s body is forced to grow all at once. It raises the Sp. Atk stat.

razor-leaf.name: razor-leaf
razor-leaf.flavor_text: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the foe. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

solar-beam.name: solar-beam
solar-beam.flavor_text: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.

poison-powder.name: poison-powder
poison-powder.flavor_text: A cloud of poisonous dust is scattered on the foe. It may poison the target.

stun-spore.name: stun-spore
stun-spore.flavor_text: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may paralyze the target.

sleep-powder.name: sleep-powder
sleep-powder.flavor_text: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep- inducing dust around the foe.

petal-dance.name: petal-dance
petal-dance.flavor_text: The user attacks by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

string-shot.name: string-shot
string-shot.flavor_text: The foe is bound with silk blown from the user’s mouth. It reduces the target’s Speed stat.

dragon-rage.name: dragon-rage
dragon-rage.flavor_text: The foe is stricken by a shock wave. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

fire-spin.name: fire-spin
fire-spin.flavor_text: The foe becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for two to five turns.

thunder-shock.name: thunder-shock
thunder-shock.flavor_text: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.

thunderbolt.name: thunderbolt
thunderbolt.flavor_text: A strong electric blast is loosed at the foe. It may also leave the foe paralyzed.

thunder-wave.name: thunder-wave
thunder-wave.flavor_text: A weak electric charge is launched at the foe. It causes paralysis if it hits.

thunder.name: thunder
thunder.flavor_text: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

rock-throw.name: rock-throw
rock-throw.flavor_text: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the foe to attack.

earthquake.name: earthquake
earthquake.flavor_text: The user sets off an earthquake that hits all the Pokémon in the battle.

fissure.name: fissure
fissure.flavor_text: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the foe in. The target instantly faints if it hits.

dig.name: dig
dig.flavor_text: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

toxic.name: toxic
toxic.flavor_text: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

confusion.name: confusion
confusion.flavor_text: The foe is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the foe confused.

psychic.name: psychic
psychic.flavor_text: The foe is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

hypnosis.name: hypnosis
hypnosis.flavor_text: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

meditate.name: meditate
meditate.flavor_text: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

agility.name: agility
agility.flavor_text: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

quick-attack.name: quick-attack
quick-attack.flavor_text: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

rage.name: rage
rage.flavor_text: While this move is in use, it gains attack power each time the user is hit in battle.

teleport.name: teleport
teleport.flavor_text: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited.

night-shade.name: night-shade
night-shade.flavor_text: The user makes the foe see a mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user’s level.

mimic.name: mimic
mimic.flavor_text: The user copies the move last used by the foe. The move can be used for the rest of the battle.

screech.name: screech
screech.flavor_text: An earsplitting screech is emitted to sharply reduce the foe’s Defense stat.

double-team.name: double-team
double-team.flavor_text: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

recover.name: recover
recover.flavor_text: A self-healing move. The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

harden.name: harden
harden.flavor_text: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

minimize.name: minimize
minimize.flavor_text: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller. The user’s evasion stat is boosted.

smokescreen.name: smokescreen
smokescreen.flavor_text: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the foe’s accuracy.

confuse-ray.name: confuse-ray
confuse-ray.flavor_text: The foe is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

withdraw.name: withdraw
withdraw.flavor_text: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

defense-curl.name: defense-curl
defense-curl.flavor_text: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

barrier.name: barrier
barrier.flavor_text: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

light-screen.name: light-screen
light-screen.flavor_text: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

haze.name: haze
haze.flavor_text: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

reflect.name: reflect
reflect.flavor_text: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

focus-energy.name: focus-energy
focus-energy.flavor_text: The user takes a deep breath and focuses to raise the critical-hit ratio of its attacks.

bide.name: bide
bide.flavor_text: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

metronome.name: metronome
metronome.flavor_text: The user waggles a finger and stimulates the brain into randomly using nearly any move.

mirror-move.name: mirror-move
mirror-move.flavor_text: The user counters the foe by mimicking the move last used by the foe.

self-destruct.name: self-destruct
self-destruct.flavor_text: The user blows up to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.

egg-bomb.name: egg-bomb
egg-bomb.flavor_text: A large egg is hurled with maximum force at the foe to inflict damage.

lick.name: lick
lick.flavor_text: The foe is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also paralyze the target.

smog.name: smog
smog.flavor_text: The foe is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target.

sludge.name: sludge
sludge.flavor_text: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the foe. It may also poison the target.

bone-club.name: bone-club
bone-club.flavor_text: The user clubs the foe with a bone. It may also make the target flinch.

fire-blast.name: fire-blast
fire-blast.flavor_text: The foe is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

waterfall.name: waterfall
waterfall.flavor_text: The user charges at the foe rapidly, and may make it flinch. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.

clamp.name: clamp
clamp.flavor_text: The foe is clamped and squeezed by the user’s very thick and sturdy shell for two to five turns.

swift.name: swift
swift.flavor_text: Star-shaped rays are shot at the foe. This attack never misses.

skull-bash.name: skull-bash
skull-bash.flavor_text: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense in the first turn, then rams the foe on the next turn.

spike-cannon.name: spike-cannon
spike-cannon.flavor_text: Sharp spikes are fired at the foe to strike two to five times in rapid succession.

constrict.name: constrict
constrict.flavor_text: The foe is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target’s Speed.

amnesia.name: amnesia
amnesia.flavor_text: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

kinesis.name: kinesis
kinesis.flavor_text: The user distracts the foe by bending a spoon. It may lower the target’s accuracy.

soft-boiled.name: soft-boiled
soft-boiled.flavor_text: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. It may also be used to heal an ally’s HP.

high-jump-kick.name: high-jump-kick
high-jump-kick.flavor_text: The foe is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

glare.name: glare
glare.flavor_text: The user intimidates the foe with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

dream-eater.name: dream-eater
dream-eater.flavor_text: An attack that works only on a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.

poison-gas.name: poison-gas
poison-gas.flavor_text: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the foe’s face. It may poison the target.

barrage.name: barrage
barrage.flavor_text: Round objects are hurled at the foe to strike two to five times in a row.

leech-life.name: leech-life
leech-life.flavor_text: A blood-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

lovely-kiss.name: lovely-kiss
lovely-kiss.flavor_text: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the foe. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

sky-attack.name: sky-attack
sky-attack.flavor_text: A second-turn attack move with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also make the target flinch.

transform.name: transform
transform.flavor_text: The user transforms into a copy of the foe right down to having the same move set.

bubble.name: bubble
bubble.flavor_text: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.

dizzy-punch.name: dizzy-punch
dizzy-punch.flavor_text: The foe is hit with rhythmically launched punches that may also leave it confused.

spore.name: spore
spore.flavor_text: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

flash.name: flash
flash.flavor_text: The user flashes a light that cuts the foe’s accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.

psywave.name: psywave
psywave.flavor_text: The foe is attacked with an odd, hot energy wave. The attack varies in intensity.

splash.name: splash
splash.flavor_text: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

acid-armor.name: acid-armor
acid-armor.flavor_text: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

crabhammer.name: crabhammer
crabhammer.flavor_text: The foe is hammered with a large pincer. This move has a high critical-hit ratio.

explosion.name: explosion
explosion.flavor_text: The user explodes to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.

fury-swipes.name: fury-swipes
fury-swipes.flavor_text: The foe is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

bonemerang.name: bonemerang
bonemerang.flavor_text: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the foe twice, coming and going.

rest.name: rest
rest.flavor_text: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status problem.

rock-slide.name: rock-slide
rock-slide.flavor_text: Large boulders are hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also make the target flinch.

hyper-fang.name: hyper-fang
hyper-fang.flavor_text: The user bites hard on the foe with its sharp front fangs. It may also make the target flinch.

sharpen.name: sharpen
sharpen.flavor_text: The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.

conversion.name: conversion
conversion.flavor_text: The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves.

tri-attack.name: tri-attack
tri-attack.flavor_text: The user strikes with a simultaneous three- beam attack. May also paralyze, burn, or freeze the target.

super-fang.name: super-fang
super-fang.flavor_text: The user chomps hard on the foe with its sharp front fangs. It cuts the target’s HP to half.

slash.name: slash
slash.flavor_text: The foe is attacked with a slash of claws, etc. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

substitute.name: substitute
substitute.flavor_text: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user’s decoy.

struggle.name: struggle
struggle.flavor_text: An attack that is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also hurts the user slightly.

sketch.name: sketch
sketch.flavor_text: It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the foe. Once used, Sketch disappears.

triple-kick.name: triple-kick
triple-kick.flavor_text: A consecutive three- kick attack that becomes more powerful with each  successive hit.

thief.name: thief
thief.flavor_text: The user attacks and steals the foe’s held item simultaneously. It can’t steal if the user holds an item.

spider-web.name: spider-web
spider-web.flavor_text: The user ensnares the foe with a thin, gooey silk so it can’t flee from battle.

mind-reader.name: mind-reader
mind-reader.flavor_text: The user senses the foe’s movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss.

nightmare.name: nightmare
nightmare.flavor_text: A sleeping foe is shown a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

flame-wheel.name: flame-wheel
flame-wheel.flavor_text: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. It may also leave the target with a burn.

snore.name: snore
snore.flavor_text: An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the foe flinch.

curse.name: curse
curse.flavor_text: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all the other types.

flail.name: flail
flail.flavor_text: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

conversion-2.name: conversion-2
conversion-2.flavor_text: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack it last took.

aeroblast.name: aeroblast
aeroblast.flavor_text: A vortex of air is shot at the foe to inflict damage. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

cotton-spore.name: cotton-spore
cotton-spore.flavor_text: The user releases cottonlike spores that cling to the foe, sharply reducing its Speed stat.

reversal.name: reversal
reversal.flavor_text: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

spite.name: spite
spite.flavor_text: The user looses its grudge on the move last used by the foe by cutting 4 PP from it.

powder-snow.name: powder-snow
powder-snow.flavor_text: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the target.

protect.name: protect
protect.flavor_text: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

mach-punch.name: mach-punch
mach-punch.flavor_text: A punch thrown at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first.

scary-face.name: scary-face
scary-face.flavor_text: The user frightens the foe with a scary face to sharply reduce its Speed stat.

feint-attack.name: feint-attack
feint-attack.flavor_text: The user draws up to the foe disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

sweet-kiss.name: sweet-kiss
sweet-kiss.flavor_text: The user kisses the foe with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

belly-drum.name: belly-drum
belly-drum.flavor_text: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

sludge-bomb.name: sludge-bomb
sludge-bomb.flavor_text: The user attacks by hurling filthy sludge at the foe. It may also poison the target.

mud-slap.name: mud-slap
mud-slap.flavor_text: The user hurls mud in the foe’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

octazooka.name: octazooka
octazooka.flavor_text: The user attacks by spraying ink in the foe’s face or eyes. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

spikes.name: spikes
spikes.flavor_text: The user lays a trap of spikes at the foe’s feet. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.

zap-cannon.name: zap-cannon
zap-cannon.flavor_text: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

foresight.name: foresight
foresight.flavor_text: Enables the user to hit a Ghost type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe.

destiny-bond.name: destiny-bond
destiny-bond.flavor_text: When this move is used, if the user faints, the foe that landed the knockout hit also faints.

perish-song.name: perish-song
perish-song.flavor_text: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns unless it switches out of battle.

icy-wind.name: icy-wind
icy-wind.flavor_text: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

detect.name: detect
detect.flavor_text: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

bone-rush.name: bone-rush
bone-rush.flavor_text: The user strikes at the foe with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

lock-on.name: lock-on
lock-on.flavor_text: The user takes sure aim at the foe. It ensures the next attack does not fail to hit the target.

outrage.name: outrage
outrage.flavor_text: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. However, it then becomes confused.

sandstorm.name: sandstorm
sandstorm.flavor_text: A five-turn sand­ storm is summoned to hurt all combatant types except Rock,  Ground, and Steel.

giga-drain.name: giga-drain
giga-drain.flavor_text: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

endure.name: endure
endure.flavor_text: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

charm.name: charm
charm.flavor_text: The user charmingly stares at the foe, making it less wary. The target’s Attack is sharply lowered.

rollout.name: rollout
rollout.flavor_text: The user continually rolls into the foe over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

false-swipe.name: false-swipe
false-swipe.flavor_text: A restrained attack that prevents the foe from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

swagger.name: swagger
swagger.flavor_text: The user enrages the foe into confusion. However, it also sharply raises the foe’s Attack stat.

milk-drink.name: milk-drink
milk-drink.flavor_text: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. It may also be used to heal an ally’s HP.

spark.name: spark
spark.flavor_text: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the foe. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

fury-cutter.name: fury-cutter
fury-cutter.flavor_text: The foe is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession.

steel-wing.name: steel-wing
steel-wing.flavor_text: The foe is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user’s Defense stat.

mean-look.name: mean-look
mean-look.flavor_text: The user affixes the foe with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

attract.name: attract
attract.flavor_text: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the foe becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

sleep-talk.name: sleep-talk
sleep-talk.flavor_text: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

heal-bell.name: heal-bell
heal-bell.flavor_text: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status problems of all the party Pokémon.

return.name: return
return.flavor_text: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

present.name: present
present.flavor_text: The user attacks by giving the foe a booby-trapped gift. It restores HP sometimes, however.

frustration.name: frustration
frustration.flavor_text: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.

safeguard.name: safeguard
safeguard.flavor_text: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

pain-split.name: pain-split
pain-split.flavor_text: The user adds its HP to the foe’s HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the foe.

sacred-fire.name: sacred-fire
sacred-fire.flavor_text: The foe is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. It may also leave the target with a burn.

magnitude.name: magnitude
magnitude.flavor_text: The user looses a ground-shaking quake affecting everyone in battle. Its power varies.

dynamic-punch.name: dynamic-punch
dynamic-punch.flavor_text: The foe is punched with the user’s full, concentrated power. It confuses the foe if it hits.

megahorn.name: megahorn
megahorn.flavor_text: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the foe  with no letup.

dragon-breath.name: dragon-breath
dragon-breath.flavor_text: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. It may also paralyze the target.

baton-pass.name: baton-pass
baton-pass.flavor_text: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

encore.name: encore
encore.flavor_text: The user compels the foe to keep using only the move it last used for three to seven turns.

pursuit.name: pursuit
pursuit.flavor_text: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a foe that is switching out of battle.

rapid-spin.name: rapid-spin
rapid-spin.flavor_text: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

sweet-scent.name: sweet-scent
sweet-scent.flavor_text: A sweet scent that lowers the foe’s evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

iron-tail.name: iron-tail
iron-tail.flavor_text: The foe is slammed with a steel-hard tail. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

metal-claw.name: metal-claw
metal-claw.flavor_text: The foe is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user’s Attack stat.

vital-throw.name: vital-throw
vital-throw.flavor_text: The user allows the foe to attack first. In return, this throw move is guaranteed not to miss.

morning-sun.name: morning-sun
morning-sun.flavor_text: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

synthesis.name: synthesis
synthesis.flavor_text: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moonlight.name: moonlight
moonlight.flavor_text: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

hidden-power.name: hidden-power
hidden-power.flavor_text: A unique attack that varies in type and intensity depending on the Pokémon using it.

cross-chop.name: cross-chop
cross-chop.flavor_text: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

twister.name: twister
twister.flavor_text: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the foe. It may also make the foe flinch.

rain-dance.name: rain-dance
rain-dance.flavor_text: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water- type moves.

sunny-day.name: sunny-day
sunny-day.flavor_text: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

crunch.name: crunch
crunch.flavor_text: The user crunches up the foe with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

mirror-coat.name: mirror-coat
mirror-coat.flavor_text: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

psych-up.name: psych-up
psych-up.flavor_text: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.

extreme-speed.name: extreme-speed
extreme-speed.flavor_text: The user charges the foe at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.

ancient-power.name: ancient-power
ancient-power.flavor_text: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

shadow-ball.name: shadow-ball
shadow-ball.flavor_text: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the foe. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

future-sight.name: future-sight
future-sight.flavor_text: Two turns after this move is used, the foe is attacked with a hunk of psychic energy.

rock-smash.name: rock-smash
rock-smash.flavor_text: The user hits with a punch that may lower the target’s Defense. It can also smash cracked boulders.

whirlpool.name: whirlpool
whirlpool.flavor_text: Traps the foe inside a whirlpool that lasts for two to five turns. The user can pass through whirlpools.

beat-up.name: beat-up
beat-up.flavor_text: The user gets all the party Pokémon to attack the foe. The more party Pokémon, the more damage.

fake-out.name: fake-out
fake-out.flavor_text: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

uproar.name: uproar
uproar.flavor_text: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

stockpile.name: stockpile
stockpile.flavor_text: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times.

spit-up.name: spit-up
spit-up.flavor_text: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the damage.

swallow.name: swallow
swallow.flavor_text: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

heat-wave.name: heat-wave
heat-wave.flavor_text: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing team. It may also leave targets with a burn.

hail.name: hail
hail.flavor_text: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

torment.name: torment
torment.flavor_text: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

flatter.name: flatter
flatter.flavor_text: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, it also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

will-o-wisp.name: will-o-wisp
will-o-wisp.flavor_text: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

memento.name: memento
memento.flavor_text: Le lanceur est mis K.O., mais l’Attaque et l’Attaque Spéciale de l’ennemi baissent beaucoup.

facade.name: facade
facade.flavor_text: An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or has paralysis.

focus-punch.name: focus-punch
focus-punch.flavor_text: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. It will fail if the user is hit before it is used.

smelling-salts.name: smelling-salts
smelling-salts.flavor_text: This attack inflicts double damage on a target with paralysis. It also cures the target’s paralysis, however.

follow-me.name: follow-me
follow-me.flavor_text: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.

nature-power.name: nature-power
nature-power.flavor_text: An attack that makes use of nature’s power. Its effects vary depending on the user’s environment.

charge.name: charge
charge.flavor_text: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. It also raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

taunt.name: taunt
taunt.flavor_text: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

helping-hand.name: helping-hand
helping-hand.flavor_text: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.

trick.name: trick
trick.flavor_text: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.

role-play.name: role-play
role-play.flavor_text: Imite la cible et copie sa capacité spéciale.

wish.name: wish
wish.flavor_text: One turn after this move is used, the target’s HP is restored by half the user’s maximum HP.

assist.name: assist
assist.flavor_text: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by other Pokémon in the party.

ingrain.name: ingrain
ingrain.flavor_text: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can’t switch out.

superpower.name: superpower
superpower.flavor_text: The user attacks the target with great power. However, it also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense.

magic-coat.name: magic-coat
magic-coat.flavor_text: A barrier reflects back to the target moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

recycle.name: recycle
recycle.flavor_text: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

revenge.name: revenge
revenge.flavor_text: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

brick-break.name: brick-break
brick-break.flavor_text: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.

yawn.name: yawn
yawn.flavor_text: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

knock-off.name: knock-off
knock-off.flavor_text: The user slaps down the target’s held item, preventing that item from being used in the battle.

endeavor.name: endeavor
endeavor.flavor_text: An attack move that cuts down the target’s HP to equal the user’s HP.

eruption.name: eruption
eruption.flavor_text: The user attacks the opposing team with explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP, the less powerful this attack becomes.

skill-swap.name: skill-swap
skill-swap.flavor_text: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

imprison.name: imprison
imprison.flavor_text: If the opponents know any move also known by the user, the opponents are prevented from using it.

refresh.name: refresh
refresh.flavor_text: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.

grudge.name: grudge
grudge.flavor_text: If the user faints, the user’s grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent’s move that knocked it out.

snatch.name: snatch
snatch.flavor_text: The user steals the effects of any healing or stat-changing move the opponent attempts to use.

secret-power.name: secret-power
secret-power.flavor_text: The user attacks the target with a secret power. Its added effects vary depending on the user’s environment.

dive.name: dive
dive.flavor_text: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the second turn. It can be used to dive deep in the ocean.

arm-thrust.name: arm-thrust
arm-thrust.flavor_text: Un déluge de coups adressés avec la paume qui frappe de 2 à 5 fois d’affilée.

camouflage.name: camouflage
camouflage.flavor_text: The user’s type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water’s edge, in grass, or in a cave.

tail-glow.name: tail-glow
tail-glow.flavor_text: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.

luster-purge.name: luster-purge
luster-purge.flavor_text: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. It may also reduce the target’s Sp. Def stat.

mist-ball.name: mist-ball
mist-ball.flavor_text: A mistlike flurry of down envelops and damages the target. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk.

feather-dance.name: feather-dance
feather-dance.flavor_text: Une montagne de plumes ensevelit l’ennemi et réduit considérablement son Attaque.

teeter-dance.name: teeter-dance
teeter-dance.flavor_text: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses the Pokémon around it.

blaze-kick.name: blaze-kick
blaze-kick.flavor_text: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. It may also leave the target with a burn.

mud-sport.name: mud-sport
mud-sport.flavor_text: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric-type moves while the user is in the battle.

ice-ball.name: ice-ball
ice-ball.flavor_text: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

needle-arm.name: needle-arm
needle-arm.flavor_text: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. It may also make the target flinch.

slack-off.name: slack-off
slack-off.flavor_text: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP.

hyper-voice.name: hyper-voice
hyper-voice.flavor_text: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

poison-fang.name: poison-fang
poison-fang.flavor_text: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. It may also leave the target badly poisoned.

crush-claw.name: crush-claw
crush-claw.flavor_text: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. It may also lower the target’s Defense.

blast-burn.name: blast-burn
blast-burn.flavor_text: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

hydro-cannon.name: hydro-cannon
hydro-cannon.flavor_text: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user must rest on the next turn, however.

meteor-mash.name: meteor-mash
meteor-mash.flavor_text: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user’s Attack.

astonish.name: astonish
astonish.flavor_text: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

weather-ball.name: weather-ball
weather-ball.flavor_text: An attack move that varies in power and type depending on the weather.

aromatherapy.name: aromatherapy
aromatherapy.flavor_text: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user’s party.

fake-tears.name: fake-tears
fake-tears.flavor_text: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

air-cutter.name: air-cutter
air-cutter.flavor_text: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.

overheat.name: overheat
overheat.flavor_text: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

odor-sleuth.name: odor-sleuth
odor-sleuth.flavor_text: Permet de toucher un Pokémon Spectre avec n’importe quelle capacité et de toucher un ennemi insaisissable.

rock-tomb.name: rock-tomb
rock-tomb.flavor_text: Boulders are hurled at the target. It also lowers the target’s Speed by preventing its movement.

silver-wind.name: silver-wind
silver-wind.flavor_text: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats.

metal-sound.name: metal-sound
metal-sound.flavor_text: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly reduces the target’s Sp. Def stat.

grass-whistle.name: grass-whistle
grass-whistle.flavor_text: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep.

tickle.name: tickle
tickle.flavor_text: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

cosmic-power.name: cosmic-power
cosmic-power.flavor_text: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

water-spout.name: water-spout
water-spout.flavor_text: The user spouts water to damage the opposing team. The lower the user’s HP, the less powerful it becomes.

signal-beam.name: signal-beam
signal-beam.flavor_text: Le lanceur projette un rayon de lumière sinistre. Peut aussi rendre l’ennemi confus.

shadow-punch.name: shadow-punch
shadow-punch.flavor_text: The user throws a punch from the shadows. The punch lands without fail.

extrasensory.name: extrasensory
extrasensory.flavor_text: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. It may also make the target flinch.

sky-uppercut.name: sky-uppercut
sky-uppercut.flavor_text: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

sand-tomb.name: sand-tomb
sand-tomb.flavor_text: Le lanceur emprisonne l’ennemi dans une tempête de sable terrifiante qui dure de 4 à 5 tours.

sheer-cold.name: sheer-cold
sheer-cold.flavor_text: The target is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target instantly faints if it hits.

muddy-water.name: muddy-water
muddy-water.flavor_text: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets’ accuracy.

bullet-seed.name: bullet-seed
bullet-seed.flavor_text: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.

aerial-ace.name: aerial-ace
aerial-ace.flavor_text: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail.

icicle-spear.name: icicle-spear
icicle-spear.flavor_text: Le lanceur jette des pics de glace sur l’ennemi, de 2 à 5 fois de suite.

iron-defense.name: iron-defense
iron-defense.flavor_text: The user hardens its body’s surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

block.name: block
block.flavor_text: The user blocks the target’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

howl.name: howl
howl.flavor_text: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat.

dragon-claw.name: dragon-claw
dragon-claw.flavor_text: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.

frenzy-plant.name: frenzy-plant
frenzy-plant.flavor_text: The user slams the target with an enormous tree. The user can’t move on the next turn.

bulk-up.name: bulk-up
bulk-up.flavor_text: Le lanceur tend ses muscles pour se gonfler, ce qui booste son Attaque et sa Défense.

bounce.name: bounce
bounce.flavor_text: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

mud-shot.name: mud-shot
mud-shot.flavor_text: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. It also reduces the target’s Speed.

poison-tail.name: poison-tail
poison-tail.flavor_text: The user hits the target with its tail. It may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

covet.name: covet
covet.flavor_text: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target’s held item.

volt-tackle.name: volt-tackle
volt-tackle.flavor_text: The user electrifies itself, then charges.  It causes considerable damage to the user and may leave the target with paralysis.

magical-leaf.name: magical-leaf
magical-leaf.flavor_text: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack will not miss.

water-sport.name: water-sport
water-sport.flavor_text: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle.

calm-mind.name: calm-mind
calm-mind.flavor_text: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

leaf-blade.name: leaf-blade
leaf-blade.flavor_text: The foe is slashed with a sharp leaf. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

dragon-dance.name: dragon-dance
dragon-dance.flavor_text: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

rock-blast.name: rock-blast
rock-blast.flavor_text: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession.

shock-wave.name: shock-wave
shock-wave.flavor_text: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded.

water-pulse.name: water-pulse
water-pulse.flavor_text: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target.

doom-desire.name: doom-desire
doom-desire.flavor_text: Two turns after this move is used, the user blasts the target with a concentrated bundle of light.

psycho-boost.name: psycho-boost
psycho-boost.flavor_text: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

roost.name: roost
roost.flavor_text: 땅에 내려와 몸을 쉬게 한다. 최대 HP의 절반만큼 HP를 회복한다.

gravity.name: gravity
gravity.flavor_text: 5턴 동안 중력을 강하게 해서 부유나 하늘을 나는 기술을 사용할 수 없게 한다.

miracle-eye.name: miracle-eye
miracle-eye.flavor_text: 악타입에 효과가 없는 기술이나 회피율이 높은 상대라 할지라도 공격이 맞게 된다.

wake-up-slap.name: wake-up-slap
wake-up-slap.flavor_text: ねむり　じょうたいの　あいてに おおきな　ダメージを　あたえる。 かわりに　あいては　ねむりから　さめる。

hammer-arm.name: hammer-arm
hammer-arm.flavor_text: 강하고 무거운 주먹을 휘둘러 데미지를 준다. 자신의 스피드가 떨어진다.

gyro-ball.name: gyro-ball
gyro-ball.flavor_text: 몸을 고속으로 회전시켜 몸통박치기한다. 상대보다 스피드가 낮을수록 위력은 올라간다.

healing-wish.name: healing-wish
healing-wish.flavor_text: 자신은 기절하지만 교대하여 나오는 포켓몬의 상태 이상과 HP를 회복한다.

brine.name: brine
brine.flavor_text: 상대가 HP의 절반 정도 상처를 입고 있으면 기술의 위력이 2배가 된다.

natural-gift.name: natural-gift
natural-gift.flavor_text: 나무열매에서 힘을 얻어 공격한다. 지니게 한 나무열매에 따라 기술의 타입과 위력이 바뀐다.

feint.name: feint
feint.flavor_text: 방어나 판별을 하고 있는 상대에게 공격할 수 있다. 방어 효과를 해제시킨다.

pluck.name: pluck
pluck.flavor_text: 부리로 공격한다. 상대가 나무열매를 지니고 있을 때 먹어서 나무열매의 효과를 받을 수 있다.

tailwind.name: tailwind
tailwind.flavor_text: 세차게 불어대는 바람의 소용돌이를 만들어 4턴 동안 같은 편 모두의 스피드를 올린다.

acupressure.name: acupressure
acupressure.flavor_text: 경혈을 눌러 몸을 활성화시킨다. 능력 중 하나를 크게 올린다.

metal-burst.name: metal-burst
metal-burst.flavor_text: 기술을 쓰기 전에 마지막으로 받은 기술의 데미지를 늘려서 기술을 쓴 상대에게 돌려준다.

u-turn.name: u-turn
u-turn.flavor_text: 공격한 뒤 굉장한 스피드로 돌아와서 교대 포켓몬과 교체한다.

close-combat.name: close-combat
close-combat.flavor_text: まもりを　すてて　あいての　ふところに とつげきする。じぶんの ぼうぎょと　とくぼうが　さがる。

payback.name: payback
payback.flavor_text: ためこんで　こうげきする。 あいてより　あとに　こうげき　できると わざの　いりょくは　２ばいに　なる。

assurance.name: assurance
assurance.flavor_text: そのターンに　あいてが すでに　ダメージを　うけて　いたら わざの　いりょくは　２ばいに　なる。

embargo.name: embargo
embargo.flavor_text: 지니게 한 도구를 쓸 수 없게 한다. 트레이너도 그 포켓몬에게는 도구를 쓸 수 없다.

fling.name: fling
fling.flavor_text: 지니게 한 도구를 재빠르게 내던져서 공격한다. 도구에 따라 위력과 효과가 바뀐다.

psycho-shift.name: psycho-shift
psycho-shift.flavor_text: 초능력으로 암시를 걸어서 자신에게 걸려 있는 상태 이상을 상대에게 옮긴다.

trump-card.name: trump-card
trump-card.flavor_text: 마지막수단의 남은 PP가 적으면 적을수록 기술의 위력이 올라간다.

heal-block.name: heal-block
heal-block.flavor_text: 5턴 동안 기술이나 특성, 지니고 있는 도구에 의한 HP 회복을 할 수 없게 한다.

wring-out.name: wring-out
wring-out.flavor_text: 강하게 조여 공격을 한다. 상대의 HP가 많이 남아 있을수록 위력이 올라간다.

power-trick.name: power-trick
power-trick.flavor_text: 초능력으로 자신의 공격과 방어의 힘을 교환한다.

gastro-acid.name: gastro-acid
gastro-acid.flavor_text: 상대의 몸에 위액을 내뱉는다. 달라붙은 위액은 상대의 특성 효과를 지운다.

lucky-chant.name: lucky-chant
lucky-chant.flavor_text: 하늘을 향해 기도를 올려 상대의 공격을 급소에 맞지 않게 한다.

me-first.name: me-first
me-first.flavor_text: 위력을 올려 상대가 쓰려고 하는 기술을 먼저 쓴다. 먼저 쓰지 않으면 실패한다.

copycat.name: copycat
copycat.flavor_text: ちょくぜんに　でた　わざを　まねして おなじ　わざを　だす。 わざが　でていないと　しっぱい　する。

power-swap.name: power-swap
power-swap.flavor_text: 초능력으로 자신과 상대의 공격과 특수공격의 능력 변화를 교체한다.

guard-swap.name: guard-swap
guard-swap.flavor_text: 초능력으로 자신과 상대의 방어와 특수방어의 능력 변화를 교체한다.

punishment.name: punishment
punishment.flavor_text: のうりょく　へんかで あいてが　パワーアップ　しているほど わざの　いりょくが　あがる。

last-resort.name: last-resort
last-resort.flavor_text: 배틀 중에 기억하고 있는 기술을 모두 사용하면 그때부터 쓸 수 있는 필살기이다.

worry-seed.name: worry-seed
worry-seed.flavor_text: 마음을 괴롭히는 씨앗을 심는다. 상대를 잠잘 수 없게 해서 특성을 불면으로 만든다.

sucker-punch.name: sucker-punch
sucker-punch.flavor_text: あいてより　さきに　こうげき　できる。 あいてが　だすわざが こうげきわざ　でないと　しっぱい　する。

toxic-spikes.name: toxic-spikes
toxic-spikes.flavor_text: 상대의 발밑에 독압정을 뿌린다. 교체로 나온 상대 포켓몬에 독을 덮어씌운다.

heart-swap.name: heart-swap
heart-swap.flavor_text: ちょうのうりょくで じぶんと　あいてに　かかっている のうりょく　へんかを　いれかえる。

aqua-ring.name: aqua-ring
aqua-ring.flavor_text: じぶんの　からだの　まわりを みずで　つくった　ベールで　おおう。 まいターン　ＨＰを　かいふく　する。

magnet-rise.name: magnet-rise
magnet-rise.flavor_text: 전기로 만든 자력의 힘으로 허공에 뜬다. 5턴 동안 부유할 수 있다.

flare-blitz.name: flare-blitz
flare-blitz.flavor_text: 불꽃을 두르고 돌진한다. 자신도 상당한 데미지를 입는다. 화상 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

force-palm.name: force-palm
force-palm.flavor_text: 상대의 몸에 충격파를 부딪쳐 공격한다. 마비 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

aura-sphere.name: aura-sphere
aura-sphere.flavor_text: 몸속에서 파동의 힘을 끌어내 쏜다. 공격은 반드시 명중한다.

rock-polish.name: rock-polish
rock-polish.flavor_text: 자신의 몸을 갈아 공기의 저항을 적게 한다. 스피드를 크게 올릴 수 있다.

poison-jab.name: poison-jab
poison-jab.flavor_text: 독에 물든 촉수나 팔로 상대를 꿰찌른다. 독 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

dark-pulse.name: dark-pulse
dark-pulse.flavor_text: 몸에서 악의로 가득한 무서운 오라를 발한다. 상대를 풀죽게 만들 때가 있다.

night-slash.name: night-slash
night-slash.flavor_text: 순간적으로 틈을 노려 상대를 베어 버린다. 급소에 맞기 쉽다.

aqua-tail.name: aqua-tail
aqua-tail.flavor_text: 세차게 날뛰는 거친 파도와 같이 큰 꼬리를 흔들어서 상대를 공격한다.

seed-bomb.name: seed-bomb
seed-bomb.flavor_text: 단단한 껍질을 가지고 있는 큰 씨앗을 힘껏 내던져 상대를 공격한다.

air-slash.name: air-slash
air-slash.flavor_text: 하늘까지 베어 가르는 공기의 칼날로 공격한다. 상대를 풀죽게 만들 때가 있다.

x-scissor.name: x-scissor
x-scissor.flavor_text: 낫이나 발톱을 가위처럼 교차시키면서 상대를 베어 가른다.

bug-buzz.name: bug-buzz
bug-buzz.flavor_text: はねの　しんどうで　おんぱを　おこして こうげきする。あいての　とくぼうを さげることが　ある。

dragon-pulse.name: dragon-pulse
dragon-pulse.flavor_text: 큰 입으로 충격파를 일으켜서 상대를 공격한다.

dragon-rush.name: dragon-rush
dragon-rush.flavor_text: 굉장한 살기로 위압하면서 몸통박치기한다. 상대를 풀죽게 만들 때가 있다.

power-gem.name: power-gem
power-gem.flavor_text: ほうせきの　ように　きらめく　ひかりを はっしゃして　あいてを　こうげきする。

drain-punch.name: drain-punch
drain-punch.flavor_text: 주먹으로 상대의 힘을 흡수한다. 입힌 데미지의 절반에 해당하는 HP를 회복할 수 있다.

vacuum-wave.name: vacuum-wave
vacuum-wave.flavor_text: 주먹을 흔들어 진공의 파도를 일으킨다. 반드시 선제공격을 할 수 있다.

focus-blast.name: focus-blast
focus-blast.flavor_text: 기합을 높여서 혼신의 힘을 방출한다. 상대의 특수방어를 떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.

energy-ball.name: energy-ball
energy-ball.flavor_text: 자연으로부터 모은 생명의 힘을 발사한다. 상대의 특수방어를 떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.

brave-bird.name: brave-bird
brave-bird.flavor_text: 날개를 접어 저공비행으로 돌격한다. 자신도 상당한 데미지를 입는다.

earth-power.name: earth-power
earth-power.flavor_text: 상대의 발밑에 대지의 힘을 방출한다. 상대의 특수방어를 떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.

switcheroo.name: switcheroo
switcheroo.flavor_text: 눈에 보이지 않는 속도로 자신과 상대가 지닌 물건을 교환한다.

giga-impact.name: giga-impact
giga-impact.flavor_text: もてる　ちからを　すべて　つかって あいてに　とつげきする。 つぎの　ターンは　うごけなく　なる。

nasty-plot.name: nasty-plot
nasty-plot.flavor_text: 나쁜 일을 생각해서 머리를 활성화시킨다. 자신의 특수공격을 크게 올린다.

bullet-punch.name: bullet-punch
bullet-punch.flavor_text: 탄환처럼 빠르고 단단한 펀치를 상대에게 날린다. 반드시 선제공격을 할 수 있다.

avalanche.name: avalanche
avalanche.flavor_text: 상대로부터 기술을 받으면 그 상대에 대해서 기술의 위력이 2배가 된다.

ice-shard.name: ice-shard
ice-shard.flavor_text: こおりの　かたまりを　いっしゅんで つくり　あいてに　すばやく　はなつ。 かならず　せんせい　こうげき　できる。

shadow-claw.name: shadow-claw
shadow-claw.flavor_text: 그림자로 만든 날카로운 발톱으로 상대를 베어 가른다. 급소에 맞기 쉽다.

thunder-fang.name: thunder-fang
thunder-fang.flavor_text: 전기를 모은 이빨로 문다. 상대를 풀죽게 하거나 마비 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

ice-fang.name: ice-fang
ice-fang.flavor_text: 냉기를 품은 이빨로 문다. 상대를 풀죽게 하거나 얼음 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

fire-fang.name: fire-fang
fire-fang.flavor_text: 불꽃을 두른 이빨로 문다. 상대를 풀죽게 하거나 화상 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

shadow-sneak.name: shadow-sneak
shadow-sneak.flavor_text: 그림자를 늘려 상대의 배후에서 공격한다. 반드시 선제공격할 수 있다.

mud-bomb.name: mud-bomb
mud-bomb.flavor_text: 단단한 진흙구슬을 상대에게 발사하여 공격한다. 명중률을 떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.

psycho-cut.name: psycho-cut
psycho-cut.flavor_text: 실체화시킨 마음의 칼날로 상대를 베어 가른다. 급소에 맞기 쉽다.

zen-headbutt.name: zen-headbutt
zen-headbutt.flavor_text: 사념의 힘을 이마에 모아서 공격한다. 상대를 풀죽게 만들 때가 있다.

mirror-shot.name: mirror-shot
mirror-shot.flavor_text: 갈고 닦은 몸에서 섬광의 힘을 상대에게 쏜다. 명중률을 떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.

flash-cannon.name: flash-cannon
flash-cannon.flavor_text: 몸의 빛을 한곳에 모아서 힘을 쏜다. 상대의 특수방어를 떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.

rock-climb.name: rock-climb
rock-climb.flavor_text: 굉장한 기세로 상대에게 돌진하여 공격한다. 상대를 혼란시킬 때가 있다.

defog.name: defog
defog.flavor_text: 강한 바람으로 상대의 리플렉터나 빛의장막 등을 제거한다. 회피율도 떨어뜨린다.

trick-room.name: trick-room
trick-room.flavor_text: 이상한 공간을 만든다. 5턴 동안 느린 포켓몬부터 행동할 수 있다.

draco-meteor.name: draco-meteor
draco-meteor.flavor_text: 천공에서 운석을 상대에게 떨어뜨린다. 사용하면 반동으로 자신의 특수공격이 크게 떨어진다.

discharge.name: discharge
discharge.flavor_text: 눈부신 전격으로 자신의 주위에 있는 포켓몬을 공격한다. 마비 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

lava-plume.name: lava-plume
lava-plume.flavor_text: 새빨간 불꽃으로 자신의 주위에 있는 포켓몬을 공격한다. 화상 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

leaf-storm.name: leaf-storm
leaf-storm.flavor_text: とがった　はっぱで　あいてに　あらしを おこす。つかうと　はんどうで じぶんの　とくこうが　がくっと　さがる。

power-whip.name: power-whip
power-whip.flavor_text: ツタや　しょくしゅを　はげしく　ふるって あいてを　たたきつけ　こうげきする。

rock-wrecker.name: rock-wrecker
rock-wrecker.flavor_text: 거대한 바위를 상대에게 발사하여 공격한다. 다음 턴은 움직일 수 없게 된다.

cross-poison.name: cross-poison
cross-poison.flavor_text: 독 칼날로 상대를 베어 가른다. 독 상태로 만들 때가 있고 급소에도 맞기 쉽다.

gunk-shot.name: gunk-shot
gunk-shot.flavor_text: 더러운 쓰레기를 상대에게 부딪쳐서 공격한다. 독 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

iron-head.name: iron-head
iron-head.flavor_text: 강철과 같은 단단한 머리로 공격한다. 상대를 풀죽게 만들 때가 있다.

magnet-bomb.name: magnet-bomb
magnet-bomb.flavor_text: 상대에게 달라붙는 강철의 폭탄을 발사한다. 공격은 반드시 명중한다.

stone-edge.name: stone-edge
stone-edge.flavor_text: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

captivate.name: captivate
captivate.flavor_text: 수컷은 암컷을 암컷은 수컷을 유혹하여 상대의 특수공격을 크게 떨어뜨린다.

stealth-rock.name: stealth-rock
stealth-rock.flavor_text: 상대의 주위에 무수한 바위를 띄워 교체해서 나온 상대 포켓몬에게 데미지를 준다.

grass-knot.name: grass-knot
grass-knot.flavor_text: くさを　からませて　あいてを ころばせる。あいてが　おもいほど いりょくが　あがる。

chatter.name: chatter
chatter.flavor_text: 기억한 말로 음파를 일으켜서 공격한다. 상대를 혼란시킨다.

judgment.name: judgment
judgment.flavor_text: 무수한 광탄을 상대에게 방출한다. 자신이 가지고 있는 플레이트에 따라 타입이 바뀐다.

bug-bite.name: bug-bite
bug-bite.flavor_text: 물어서 공격한다. 상대가 나무열매를 지니고 있을 때 먹어서 나무열매의 효과를 받을 수 있다.

charge-beam.name: charge-beam
charge-beam.flavor_text: 전격의 다발을 상대에게 발사한다. 전기를 모아서 자신의 특수공격을 올릴 때가 있다.

wood-hammer.name: wood-hammer
wood-hammer.flavor_text: 단단한 몸통을 상대에게 부딪쳐서 공격한다. 자신도 상당한 데미지를 입는다.

aqua-jet.name: aqua-jet
aqua-jet.flavor_text: 눈에 보이지 않는 굉장한 속도로 상대에게 돌진한다. 반드시 선제공격할 수 있다.

attack-order.name: attack-order
attack-order.flavor_text: 부하를 불러내어 상대를 향해서 공격시킨다. 급소에 맞기 쉽다.

defend-order.name: defend-order
defend-order.flavor_text: 부하를 불러내어 자신의 몸을 뒤덮게 한다. 방어와 특수방어를 올릴 수 있다.

heal-order.name: heal-order
heal-order.flavor_text: 부하를 불러내어 상처를 회복한다. 최대 HP의 절반만큼 자신의 HP를 회복한다.

head-smash.name: head-smash
head-smash.flavor_text: いのちを　かけて　こんしんの　ちからで あいてに　ずつきを　する。じぶんも ものすごい　ダメージを　うける。

double-hit.name: double-hit
double-hit.flavor_text: しっぽなどを　つかい　あいてを　たたいて こうげきする。２かい　れんぞくで ダメージを　あたえる。

roar-of-time.name: roar-of-time
roar-of-time.flavor_text: 시간이 뒤틀릴 정도의 힘을 사용해서 상대를 공격한다. 다음 턴은 움직일 수 없다.

spacial-rend.name: spacial-rend
spacial-rend.flavor_text: まわりの　くうかんごと　あいてを ひきさき　ダメージを　あたえる。 きゅうしょに　あたりやすい。

lunar-dance.name: lunar-dance
lunar-dance.flavor_text: 자신은 기절하지만 교대하여 나오는 포켓몬의 모든 상태를 회복한다.

crush-grip.name: crush-grip
crush-grip.flavor_text: 굉장한 힘으로 상대를 묵사발로 만든다. 상대의 HP가 남아 있을수록 위력이 올라간다.

magma-storm.name: magma-storm
magma-storm.flavor_text: はげしく　もえたぎる　ほのおの　なかに ４ー５ターンの　あいだ あいてを　とじこめて　こうげきする。

dark-void.name: dark-void
dark-void.flavor_text: 암흑의 세계로 끌고 가서 떨어뜨려 상대를 잠듦 상태로 만든다.

seed-flare.name: seed-flare
seed-flare.flavor_text: 몸속에서 충격파를 발생시킨다. 상대의 특수방어를 크게 떨어뜨릴 때가 있다.

ominous-wind.name: ominous-wind
ominous-wind.flavor_text: 소름이 끼칠 만한 돌풍으로 상대를 공격한다. 자신의 모든 능력이 올라갈 때가 있다.

shadow-force.name: shadow-force
shadow-force.flavor_text: 1턴째에 모습을 감춰 2턴째에 상대를 공격한다. 방어하고 있어도 공격은 맞는다.

hone-claws.name: hone-claws
hone-claws.flavor_text: El usuario se afila las garras para aumentar su Ataque y Precisión.

wide-guard.name: wide-guard
wide-guard.flavor_text: Bloquea los ataques de objetivo múltiple lanzados contra tu equipo durante un turno.

guard-split.name: guard-split
guard-split.flavor_text: El usuario emplea sus poderes para hacer la media de su Defensa y Defensa Especial con las de su objetivo y compartirlas.

power-split.name: power-split
power-split.flavor_text: El usuario emplea sus poderes para hacer la media de su Ataque y Ataque Especial con los de su objetivo y compartirlos.

wonder-room.name: wonder-room
wonder-room.flavor_text: Crea una zona misteriosa donde se intercambian la Defensa y la Defensa Especial de todos los Pokémon durante cinco turnos.

psyshock.name: psyshock
psyshock.flavor_text: Crea una onda psíquica que causa daño físico al objetivo.

venoshock.name: venoshock
venoshock.flavor_text: Ataca cubriendo al objetivo con un líquido venenoso. El daño será doble si este ya está envenenado.

autotomize.name: autotomize
autotomize.flavor_text: El usuario se sacude para hacerse más ligero y aumentar mucho su Velocidad.

rage-powder.name: rage-powder
rage-powder.flavor_text: Usa un polvo que irrita y centra en el usuario la atención y los ataques de los rivales.

telekinesis.name: telekinesis
telekinesis.flavor_text: El usuario emplea su poder mental para hacer flotar al objetivo, y lo convierte en un blanco fácil durante tres turnos.

magic-room.name: magic-room
magic-room.flavor_text: Anwender erzeugt einen bizarren Raum, in dem über fünf Runden die Wirkung aller von Pokémon getragenen Items aufgehoben ist.

smack-down.name: smack-down
smack-down.flavor_text: El usuario ataca lanzando una piedra o un proyectil. Puede estrellar contra el suelo al objetivo si vuela.

storm-throw.name: storm-throw
storm-throw.flavor_text: Lanza un golpe fulminante. Siempre resulta en un golpe crítico.

flame-burst.name: flame-burst
flame-burst.flavor_text: Golpea al objetivo con una llamarada que afecta también a los Pokémon adyacentes.

sludge-wave.name: sludge-wave
sludge-wave.flavor_text: Una onda tóxica que daña a los Pokémon de alrededor. Puede envenenar.

quiver-dance.name: quiver-dance
quiver-dance.flavor_text: Anwender legt behände einen mystischen, formvollendeten Tanz aufs Parkett. Spezial-Angriff, Spezial-Verteidigung und Initiative steigen.

heavy-slam.name: heavy-slam
heavy-slam.flavor_text: El usuario golpea con todo su cuerpo. Cuanto mayor sea su peso comparado con el del objetivo, más daño causará.

synchronoise.name: synchronoise
synchronoise.flavor_text: Una extraña onda que daña a todos los Pokémon adyacentes del mismo tipo que el que la ejecuta.

electro-ball.name: electro-ball
electro-ball.flavor_text: Lanza una bola eléctrica. Cuanto mayor sea la Velocidad del usuario en comparación con la del objetivo, mayor será el daño causado.

soak.name: soak
soak.flavor_text: Potente lluvia que transforma al objetivo en un Pokémon de tipo Agua.

flame-charge.name: flame-charge
flame-charge.flavor_text: Llamas que golpean al objetivo y aumentan la Velocidad del atacante.

coil.name: coil
coil.flavor_text: El usuario se concentra, lo que le permite aumentar su Ataque, Defensa y Precisión.

low-sweep.name: low-sweep
low-sweep.flavor_text: Ataque rápido dirigido a los pies del objetivo que le hace perder Velocidad.

acid-spray.name: acid-spray
acid-spray.flavor_text: Anwender greift an, indem er eine ätzende Flüssigkeit auf das Ziel speit. Senkt dessen Spezial-Verteidigung stark.

foul-play.name: foul-play
foul-play.flavor_text: El usuario emplea la fuerza del objetivo para atacarlo. Cuanto mayor es el Ataque del objetivo, más daño provoca.

simple-beam.name: simple-beam
simple-beam.flavor_text: Lanza una onda psíquica que hace que la habilidad del objetivo pase a ser Simple.

entrainment.name: entrainment
entrainment.flavor_text: Una extraña danza que hace que el usuario y el objetivo tengan la misma habilidad.

after-you.name: after-you
after-you.flavor_text: Si el usuario es el más rápido, permite al objetivo usar un movimiento justo tras él, adelantándose a Pokémon más rápidos.

round.name: round
round.flavor_text: Un canto que ataca al objetivo. Cuantos más Pokémon lo usan, más aumenta de potencia.

echoed-voice.name: echoed-voice
echoed-voice.flavor_text: Un susurro que aumenta de potencia conforme el usuario y otros Pokémon lo van utilizando.

chip-away.name: chip-away
chip-away.flavor_text: Un ataque que busca los puntos débiles del objetivo y puede causarle daño aunque cambien sus características.

clear-smog.name: clear-smog
clear-smog.flavor_text: Ataca al objetivo con una extraña niebla que elimina sus cambios de características.

stored-power.name: stored-power
stored-power.flavor_text: Acumula poder para golpear. Cuanto más suban las características del usuario, mayor será el daño.

quick-guard.name: quick-guard
quick-guard.flavor_text: Protege a todo el equipo de los movimientos que se adelantan y atacan primero.

ally-switch.name: ally-switch
ally-switch.flavor_text: Extraño poder que intercambia la posición del usuario con la de un aliado sobre el terreno de combate.

scald.name: scald
scald.flavor_text: Ataca arrojando agua hirviendo al objetivo. Puede causar quemaduras.

shell-smash.name: shell-smash
shell-smash.flavor_text: El usuario rompe su coraza y baja su Defensa y Defensa Especial, pero aumenta mucho su Ataque, Ataque Especial y Velocidad.

heal-pulse.name: heal-pulse
heal-pulse.flavor_text: Anwender löst eine Schmerzen lindernde Welle aus und heilt dabei das Ziel mit der Hälfte seiner maximalen KP.

hex.name: hex
hex.flavor_text: Ataque que causa un gran daño a los objetivos que sufren problemas de estado.

sky-drop.name: sky-drop
sky-drop.flavor_text: Primer turno: lanza al objetivo al aire. Segundo turno: lo hace caer. Mientras está en el aire, no lo deja moverse.

shift-gear.name: shift-gear
shift-gear.flavor_text: Al hacer girar los engranajes, el usuario mejora su Ataque y aumenta su Velocidad espectacularmente.

circle-throw.name: circle-throw
circle-throw.flavor_text: Lanza por los aires al objetivo y hace que salga otro Pokémon. Si es uno salvaje, acaba el combate.

incinerate.name: incinerate
incinerate.flavor_text: Llamas que golpean a los objetivos adyacentes. Si estos llevan bayas u otros objetos, estos se quemarán y ya no se podrán usar.

quash.name: quash
quash.flavor_text: 상대를 억눌러서 행동의 순서를 마지막으로 만든다.

acrobatics.name: acrobatics
acrobatics.flavor_text: Golpea ágilmente. Si el usuario no porta ningún objeto, el objetivo resulta seriamente dañado.

reflect-type.name: reflect-type
reflect-type.flavor_text: Anwender bildet das Ziel nach und nimmt dabei dessen Typ an.

retaliate.name: retaliate
retaliate.flavor_text: Venga a los amigos derrotados. Si en el turno anterior han derrotado a uno, la potencia del ataque aumentará.

final-gambit.name: final-gambit
final-gambit.flavor_text: El usuario se sacrifica causándole un daño al objetivo equivalente a sus propios PS perdidos.

bestow.name: bestow
bestow.flavor_text: Entrega el objeto que lleva al objetivo en caso de que este no tenga ninguno.

inferno.name: inferno
inferno.flavor_text: Ataca con una gran ráfaga de fuego que causa quemaduras.

water-pledge.name: water-pledge
water-pledge.flavor_text: Ataca con columnas de agua. Combinado con Voto Fuego, crea un arcoíris y aumenta su potencia.

fire-pledge.name: fire-pledge
fire-pledge.flavor_text: Ataca con columnas de fuego. Combinado con Voto Planta, crea un mar de llamas y aumenta su potencia.

grass-pledge.name: grass-pledge
grass-pledge.flavor_text: Ataca con columnas de hojas. Combinado con Voto Agua, crea un pantano y aumenta su potencia.

volt-switch.name: volt-switch
volt-switch.flavor_text: Tras atacar, vuelve a toda prisa para dar paso a otro Pokémon del equipo.

struggle-bug.name: struggle-bug
struggle-bug.flavor_text: El usuario opone resistencia y ataca a los oponentes. También reduce su Ataque Especial.

bulldoze.name: bulldoze
bulldoze.flavor_text: Sacudida sísmica que afecta a los demás Pokémon adyacentes y también reduce su Velocidad.

frost-breath.name: frost-breath
frost-breath.flavor_text: Quien lo usa ataca lanzando un aliento gélido. Siempre resulta en un golpe crítico.

dragon-tail.name: dragon-tail
dragon-tail.flavor_text: Ataca al objetivo y lo obliga a cambiarse por otro Pokémon. Si es uno salvaje, acaba el combate.

work-up.name: work-up
work-up.flavor_text: Anwender erhält einen Kraftschub, der seinen Angriff und Spezial-Angriff erhöht.

electroweb.name: electroweb
electroweb.flavor_text: Atrapa y ataca a los objetivos con una telaraña eléctrica. También reduce su Velocidad.

wild-charge.name: wild-charge
wild-charge.flavor_text: Carga eléctrica muy potente que también hiere ligeramente a quien la usa.

drill-run.name: drill-run
drill-run.flavor_text: El usuario golpea usando su cuerpo como un taladro. Suele ser crítico.

dual-chop.name: dual-chop
dual-chop.flavor_text: Golpea dos veces seguidas con la cola u otras partes de su cuerpo.

heart-stamp.name: heart-stamp
heart-stamp.flavor_text: Grácil gesto que asesta un golpe tremendo al objetivo y puede hacerlo retroceder.

horn-leech.name: horn-leech
horn-leech.flavor_text: Un golpe que drena energía. El Pokémon recupera la mitad de los PS arrebatados al objetivo.

sacred-sword.name: sacred-sword
sacred-sword.flavor_text: El usuario ataca con una espada, ignorando cualquier cambio en las características del objetivo.

razor-shell.name: razor-shell
razor-shell.flavor_text: Schneideangriff mit einer scharfen Muschelschale. Senkt eventuell die Verteidigung des Zieles.

heat-crash.name: heat-crash
heat-crash.flavor_text: El usuario ataca con su cuerpo ardiente. Cuanto mayor sea su peso comparado con el del objetivo, más daño causará.

leaf-tornado.name: leaf-tornado
leaf-tornado.flavor_text: Tritura con afiladas hojas y puede bajar la Precisión del objetivo.

steamroller.name: steamroller
steamroller.flavor_text: El usuario se hace una bola y arrolla al objetivo con su cuerpo. Puede hacerlo retroceder.

cotton-guard.name: cotton-guard
cotton-guard.flavor_text: Anwender schützt sich, indem er sich in einen luftigen Flaum hüllt. Erhöht die Verteidigung drastisch.

night-daze.name: night-daze
night-daze.flavor_text: Ataca al objetivo con una onda siniestra. Puede bajar su Precisión.

psystrike.name: psystrike
psystrike.flavor_text: Crea una onda psíquica que causa daño físico al objetivo.

tail-slap.name: tail-slap
tail-slap.flavor_text: Anwender greift das Ziel mit seiner schlagfesten Rute zwei- bis fünfmal hintereinander an.

hurricane.name: hurricane
hurricane.flavor_text: Golpea al objetivo con un fuerte torbellino que envuelve al rival y puede confundirlo.

head-charge.name: head-charge
head-charge.flavor_text: Propina un tremendo cabezazo. También daña al usuario un poco.

gear-grind.name: gear-grind
gear-grind.flavor_text: Rota dos engranajes de hierro sobre el objetivo. Golpea dos veces.

searing-shot.name: searing-shot
searing-shot.flavor_text: Un infierno de llamas daña a los Pokémon adyacentes en combate. Puede quemar.

techno-blast.name: techno-blast
techno-blast.flavor_text: Ataca al objetivo con un gran láser. El tipo del ataque lo determina el cartucho que porta el usuario.

relic-song.name: relic-song
relic-song.flavor_text: Ataca conmoviendo a los rivales de alrededor con un antiguo canto. Puede dormirlos.

secret-sword.name: secret-sword
secret-sword.flavor_text: Ensarta al objetivo con un sable, hiriéndolo con su místico poder. Produce daño físico.

glaciate.name: glaciate
glaciate.flavor_text: Anwender greift an, indem er dem Ziel klirrend kalte Luft entgegenbläst. Senkt die Initiative des Zieles.

bolt-strike.name: bolt-strike
bolt-strike.flavor_text: Lädt seinen Körper mit einer gewaltigen Menge an Elektrizität auf und rammt damit das Ziel. Ziel wird eventuell paralysiert.

blue-flare.name: blue-flare
blue-flare.flavor_text: Ataca con una bella pero potente llama azul que rodea al objetivo. Puede quemarlo.

fiery-dance.name: fiery-dance
fiery-dance.flavor_text: Envuelve en llamas y daña al objetivo. Puede aumentar el Ataque Especial de quien lo usa.

freeze-shock.name: freeze-shock
freeze-shock.flavor_text: El usuario carga un bloque de hielo con electricidad en el primer turno y ataca con él en el segundo. Puede paralizar.

ice-burn.name: ice-burn
ice-burn.flavor_text: Ataca al objetivo en el segundo turno rodeándolo de un aire gélido. Puede causar quemaduras.

snarl.name: snarl
snarl.flavor_text: Ataca con un chillido desagradable que baja el Ataque Especial del rival.

icicle-crash.name: icicle-crash
icicle-crash.flavor_text: Lanza grandes carámbanos. Puede hacer retroceder al objetivo.

v-create.name: v-create
v-create.flavor_text: Golpea con una V de llamas al objetivo. Baja la Defensa, la Defensa Especial y la Velocidad de quien lo usa.

fusion-flare.name: fusion-flare
fusion-flare.flavor_text: Ataca con una llamarada gigantesca. Aumenta su potencia si es influenciada por una gran energía eléctrica.

fusion-bolt.name: fusion-bolt
fusion-bolt.flavor_text: Ataca con una enorme descarga eléctrica. Aumenta su potencia si es influenciada por una gigantesca llamarada.

flying-press.name: flying-press
flying-press.flavor_text: 空中から　相手に　ダイブする。 この技は　かくとうタイプと　同時に ひこうタイプでも　ある。

mat-block.name: mat-block
mat-block.flavor_text: かえした　タタミを　盾にして　自分や 味方への　技の　ダメージを　防ぐ。 変化技は　防ぐことが　できない。

belch.name: belch
belch.flavor_text: 相手に　向かって　ゲップを 浴びせて　ダメージを　与える。 きのみを　食べないと　だせない。

rototiller.name: rototiller
rototiller.flavor_text: 地面を　耕して　草木が 育ちやすいようにする。くさタイプの 攻撃と　特攻が　あがる。

sticky-web.name: sticky-web
sticky-web.flavor_text: 相手の　周りに　ねばねばした ネットを　はりめぐらせ　交代で でてきた　相手の　素早さを　さげる。

fell-stinger.name: fell-stinger
fell-stinger.flavor_text: この　技を　使って 相手を　倒すと 攻撃が　ぐーんと　あがる。

phantom-force.name: phantom-force
phantom-force.flavor_text: １ターンめで　どこかに　消えて ２ターンめに　相手を　攻撃する。 守りを　無視して　攻撃できる。

trick-or-treat.name: trick-or-treat
trick-or-treat.flavor_text: 相手を　ハロウィンに　誘う。 相手の　タイプに ゴーストタイプが　追加される。

noble-roar.name: noble-roar
noble-roar.flavor_text: おたけびを　あげて 相手を　威嚇し　相手の 攻撃と　特攻を　さげる。

ion-deluge.name: ion-deluge
ion-deluge.flavor_text: 電気を　帯びた　粒子を 拡散し　ノーマルタイプの　技を でんきタイプに　してしまう。

parabolic-charge.name: parabolic-charge
parabolic-charge.flavor_text: 周りにいる　ポケモン　全員に ダメージ。与えた　ダメージの 半分を　自分が　回復する。

forests-curse.name: forests-curse
forests-curse.flavor_text: 相手に　森ののろいを　かける。 のろいを　かけられた　相手は タイプに　くさタイプが　追加される。

petal-blizzard.name: petal-blizzard
petal-blizzard.flavor_text: 激しい　花吹雪を　起こし 周りに　いるものに　攻撃して ダメージを　与える。

freeze-dry.name: freeze-dry
freeze-dry.flavor_text: 相手を　急激に　冷やして こおり　状態に　することが　ある。 みずタイプにも　効果抜群になる。

disarming-voice.name: disarming-voice
disarming-voice.flavor_text: 魅惑の　鳴き声を　だして　相手に 精神的な　ダメージを　与える。 攻撃は　必ず　命中　する。

parting-shot.name: parting-shot
parting-shot.flavor_text: すてゼリフで　相手を　いかくし 攻撃と　特攻を　さげたのち 控えの　ポケモンと　入れ替わる。

topsy-turvy.name: topsy-turvy
topsy-turvy.flavor_text: 相手に　かかっている すべての　能力変化を ひっくり返して　逆にする。

draining-kiss.name: draining-kiss
draining-kiss.flavor_text: キッスによって　相手から　ＨＰを 吸い取る。与えた　ダメージの 半分以上　ＨＰを　回復する。

crafty-shield.name: crafty-shield
crafty-shield.flavor_text: 不思議な　力を　使って 味方への　変化技を　防ぐ。 ダメージ技は　受けてしまう。

flower-shield.name: flower-shield
flower-shield.flavor_text: The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

grassy-terrain.name: grassy-terrain
grassy-terrain.flavor_text: ５ターンの　あいだ　足元を グラスフィールドにする。地面にいる ポケモンは　毎ターン　回復する。

misty-terrain.name: misty-terrain
misty-terrain.flavor_text: ５ターンの　あいだ　足元を ミストフィールドにする。地面にいると 状態異常に　ならない。

electrify.name: electrify
electrify.flavor_text: 相手が　技を　だす前に そうでん　すると　そのターン 相手の　技は　でんきタイプになる。

play-rough.name: play-rough
play-rough.flavor_text: 相手に　じゃれついて 攻撃する。　相手の 攻撃を　さげる　ことがある。

fairy-wind.name: fairy-wind
fairy-wind.flavor_text: ようせいのかぜを　起こし 相手に　吹きつけて　攻撃する。

moonblast.name: moonblast
moonblast.flavor_text: 月の　パワーを　かりて 相手を　攻撃する。　相手の 特攻を　さげる　ことがある。

boomburst.name: boomburst
boomburst.flavor_text: すさまじい　爆音の 破壊力に　よって 周りに　いるものを　攻撃する。

fairy-lock.name: fairy-lock
fairy-lock.flavor_text: ロックを　かけることによって 次のターン　すべての ポケモンを　逃げられなくする。

kings-shield.name: kings-shield
kings-shield.flavor_text: 相手の　攻撃を　防ぐと　同時に 防御態勢になる。　触れた 相手の　攻撃を　がくっと　さげる。

play-nice.name: play-nice
play-nice.flavor_text: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target’s Attack stat.

confide.name: confide
confide.flavor_text: ないしょばなしを　することで　相手の 集中力を　失わせ 相手の　特攻を　さげる。

diamond-storm.name: diamond-storm
diamond-storm.flavor_text: ダイヤの　嵐を　巻き起こし ダメージを　与える。　自分の 防御を　あげることが　ある。

steam-eruption.name: steam-eruption
steam-eruption.flavor_text: Travolge il bersaglio con un’ondata di vapore rovente che può anche scottarlo.

hyperspace-hole.name: hyperspace-hole
hyperspace-hole.flavor_text: 異次元ホールで　突然　相手の 真横に　現れ　攻撃する。 まもるや　みきりも　無視　できる。

water-shuriken.name: water-shuriken
water-shuriken.flavor_text: 粘液で　できた　手裏剣を ２ー５回の　あいだ　連続で　だす。 必ず　先制攻撃　できる。

mystical-fire.name: mystical-fire
mystical-fire.flavor_text: 口から　吐きだす　特別 熱い　炎で　攻撃する。 相手の　特攻を　さげる。

spiky-shield.name: spiky-shield
spiky-shield.flavor_text: 相手の　攻撃を　防ぐと 同時に　触れた　相手の 体力を　削って　しまう。

aromatic-mist.name: aromatic-mist
aromatic-mist.flavor_text: 不思議な　アロマの　香りによって 味方の　特防を　あげる。

eerie-impulse.name: eerie-impulse
eerie-impulse.flavor_text: 体から　かいでんぱを　放ち 相手に　浴びせる　ことによって 特攻を　がくっと　さげる。

venom-drench.name: venom-drench
venom-drench.flavor_text: 特殊な　毒液を　浴びせかける。 毒状態の　相手は 攻撃　特攻　素早さが　さがる。

powder.name: powder
powder.flavor_text: ふんじんを　浴びせた　相手が ほのお技を　使うと 爆発して　ダメージを　与える。

geomancy.name: geomancy
geomancy.flavor_text: １ターン目で　エネルギーを 吸収し　２ターン目に　特攻 特防　素早さを　ぐーんと　あげる。

magnetic-flux.name: magnetic-flux
magnetic-flux.flavor_text: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

happy-hour.name: happy-hour
happy-hour.flavor_text: ハッピータイムの　技を　使うと 戦闘の　あとで　もらえる お金が　倍になる。

electric-terrain.name: electric-terrain
electric-terrain.flavor_text: The user electrifies the ground under everyone’s feet for five turns. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

dazzling-gleam.name: dazzling-gleam
dazzling-gleam.flavor_text: 強力な　光を　放ち 相手に　ダメージを　与える。

celebrate.name: celebrate
celebrate.flavor_text: ポケモンが　とっても ハッピーな　あなたのことを お祝い　してくれる。

hold-hands.name: hold-hands
hold-hands.flavor_text: 味方の　ポケモン　同士が 手をつなぐ。　とっても　幸せな 気持ちに　なれる。

baby-doll-eyes.name: baby-doll-eyes
baby-doll-eyes.flavor_text: つぶらなひとみで　相手を　みつめて 攻撃を　さげる。 必ず　先制攻撃　できる。

nuzzle.name: nuzzle
nuzzle.flavor_text: 電気を　帯びた　ほっぺを すりつけて　攻撃。 相手を　まひ状態に　する。

hold-back.name: hold-back
hold-back.flavor_text: 手加減　した　攻撃で 相手の　ＨＰを 必ず　１だけ　残す。

infestation.name: infestation
infestation.flavor_text: ４ー５ターンの　あいだ　相手に まとわりついて　攻撃する。 そのあいだ　相手は　逃げられない。

power-up-punch.name: power-up-punch
power-up-punch.flavor_text: 繰り返し　打つことで だんだん　こぶしが　固くなる。 相手に　当てると　攻撃が　あがる。

oblivion-wing.name: oblivion-wing
oblivion-wing.flavor_text: ねらいを　定めた　相手から　ＨＰを 吸い取る。与えた　ダメージの 半分以上　ＨＰを　回復する。

thousand-arrows.name: thousand-arrows
thousand-arrows.flavor_text: 浮いている　ポケモンにも　当たる。 浮いていた　相手は 撃ち落とされて　地面に　落ちる。

thousand-waves.name: thousand-waves
thousand-waves.flavor_text: 地をはう　波によって　攻撃。 波に　巻き込まれた　相手は 戦闘から　逃げられなくなる。

lands-wrath.name: lands-wrath
lands-wrath.flavor_text: Acumula energía de la corteza terrestre y la concentra contra los oponentes, dañándolos.

light-of-ruin.name: light-of-ruin
light-of-ruin.flavor_text: 永遠の花　の　パワーを　かりて 強力な　光線を　撃ちだす。 自分も　かなりの　ダメージを　受ける。

origin-pulse.name: origin-pulse
origin-pulse.flavor_text: Attacca i nemici intorno colpendoli con miriadi di raggi di luce blu.

precipice-blades.name: precipice-blades
precipice-blades.flavor_text: 大地の　力を　刃に　変えて 相手を　攻撃する。

dragon-ascent.name: dragon-ascent
dragon-ascent.flavor_text: 大空から　急速落下　して 相手を　攻撃する。 自分の　防御と　特防が　さがる。

hyperspace-fury.name: hyperspace-fury
hyperspace-fury.flavor_text: たくさんの　腕を　つかって　まもるや  きりを　無視した　連続攻撃 自分の　防御が　さがる。

breakneck-blitz--physical.name: breakneck-blitz--physical
breakneck-blitz--physical.flavor_text: The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power and crashes into the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

all-out-pummeling--physical.name: all-out-pummeling--physical
all-out-pummeling--physical.flavor_text: The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power into the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

supersonic-skystrike--physical.name: supersonic-skystrike--physical
