supersonic-skystrike--physical.flavor_text: The user soars up with its Z-Power and plummets toward the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

acid-downpour--physical.name: acid-downpour--physical
acid-downpour--physical.flavor_text: The user creates a poisonous swamp using its Z-Power and sinks the target into it at full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

tectonic-rage--physical.name: tectonic-rage--physical
tectonic-rage--physical.flavor_text: The user burrows deep into the ground and slams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

continental-crush--physical.name: continental-crush--physical
continental-crush--physical.flavor_text: The user summons a huge rock mountain using its Z-Power and drops it onto the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

savage-spin-out--physical.name: savage-spin-out--physical
savage-spin-out--physical.flavor_text: The user binds the target with full force with threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

never-ending-nightmare--physical.name: never-ending-nightmare--physical
never-ending-nightmare--physical.flavor_text: Deep-seated grudges summoned by the user’s Z-Power trap the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

corkscrew-crash--physical.name: corkscrew-crash--physical
corkscrew-crash--physical.flavor_text: The user spins very fast and rams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

inferno-overdrive--physical.name: inferno-overdrive--physical
inferno-overdrive--physical.flavor_text: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.

hydro-vortex--physical.name: hydro-vortex--physical
hydro-vortex--physical.flavor_text: The user creates a huge whirling current using its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

bloom-doom--physical.name: bloom-doom--physical
bloom-doom--physical.flavor_text: The user collects energy from plants using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

gigavolt-havoc--physical.name: gigavolt-havoc--physical
gigavolt-havoc--physical.flavor_text: The user hits the target with a powerful electric current collected by its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

shattered-psyche--physical.name: shattered-psyche--physical
shattered-psyche--physical.flavor_text: The user controls the target with its Z-Power and hurts the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

subzero-slammer--physical.name: subzero-slammer--physical
subzero-slammer--physical.flavor_text: The user dramatically drops the temperature using its Z-Power and freezes the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

devastating-drake--physical.name: devastating-drake--physical
devastating-drake--physical.flavor_text: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

black-hole-eclipse--physical.name: black-hole-eclipse--physical
black-hole-eclipse--physical.flavor_text: Chi la usa si serve del Potere Z per concentrare energia negativa con cui inghiotte il bersaglio. La potenza varia a seconda della mossa su cui si basa.

twinkle-tackle--physical.name: twinkle-tackle--physical
twinkle-tackle--physical.flavor_text: The user creates a very charming space using its Z-Power and totally toys with the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

catastropika.name: catastropika
catastropika.flavor_text: The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the maximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power and pounces on its target with full force.

shore-up.name: shore-up
shore-up.flavor_text: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

first-impression.name: first-impression
first-impression.flavor_text: È una mossa molto potente, ma funziona solo appena scesi in campo.

baneful-bunker.name: baneful-bunker
baneful-bunker.flavor_text: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

spirit-shackle.name: spirit-shackle
spirit-shackle.flavor_text: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.

darkest-lariat.name: darkest-lariat
darkest-lariat.flavor_text: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

sparkling-aria.name: sparkling-aria
sparkling-aria.flavor_text: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.

ice-hammer.name: ice-hammer
ice-hammer.flavor_text: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

floral-healing.name: floral-healing
floral-healing.flavor_text: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.

high-horsepower.name: high-horsepower
high-horsepower.flavor_text: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

strength-sap.name: strength-sap
strength-sap.flavor_text: Restaura una cantidad de PS equivalente al valor de Ataque del rival, que además verá reducida esta característica.

solar-blade.name: solar-blade
solar-blade.flavor_text: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and fills a blade with the light’s energy, attacking the target on the next turn.

leafage.name: leafage
leafage.flavor_text: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

spotlight.name: spotlight
spotlight.flavor_text: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn.

toxic-thread.name: toxic-thread
toxic-thread.flavor_text: Avvelena il bersaglio avvolgendolo con filamenti tossici e ne riduce la Velocità.

laser-focus.name: laser-focus
laser-focus.flavor_text: The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit.

gear-up.name: gear-up
gear-up.flavor_text: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

throat-chop.name: throat-chop
throat-chop.flavor_text: The user attacks the target’s throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using moves that emit sound for two turns.

pollen-puff.name: pollen-puff
pollen-puff.flavor_text: Chi la usa attacca il nemico con una sfera esplosiva. Se colpisce degli alleati, fa recuperare loro dei PS.

anchor-shot.name: anchor-shot
anchor-shot.flavor_text: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

psychic-terrain.name: psychic-terrain
psychic-terrain.flavor_text: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

lunge.name: lunge
lunge.flavor_text: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

fire-lash.name: fire-lash
fire-lash.flavor_text: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

power-trip.name: power-trip
power-trip.flavor_text: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.

burn-up.name: burn-up
burn-up.flavor_text: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

speed-swap.name: speed-swap
speed-swap.flavor_text: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

smart-strike.name: smart-strike
smart-strike.flavor_text: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

purify.name: purify
purify.flavor_text: The user heals the target’s status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.

revelation-dance.name: revelation-dance
revelation-dance.flavor_text: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.

core-enforcer.name: core-enforcer
core-enforcer.flavor_text: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.

trop-kick.name: trop-kick
trop-kick.flavor_text: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

instruct.name: instruct
instruct.flavor_text: The user instructs the target to use the target’s last move again.

beak-blast.name: beak-blast
beak-blast.flavor_text: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it’s heating up its beak results in a burn.

clanging-scales.name: clanging-scales
clanging-scales.flavor_text: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon. The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.

dragon-hammer.name: dragon-hammer
dragon-hammer.flavor_text: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

brutal-swing.name: brutal-swing
brutal-swing.flavor_text: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

aurora-veil.name: aurora-veil
aurora-veil.flavor_text: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.

sinister-arrow-raid.name: sinister-arrow-raid
sinister-arrow-raid.flavor_text: Grazie al Potere Z, Decidueye crea una formazione di frecce che colpisce il bersaglio a gran velocità.

malicious-moonsault.name: malicious-moonsault
malicious-moonsault.flavor_text: The user, Incineroar, strengthens its body using its Z-Power and crashes into the target with full force.

oceanic-operetta.name: oceanic-operetta
oceanic-operetta.flavor_text: The user, Primarina, summons a massive amount of  water using its Z-Power and attacks the target with  full force.

guardian-of-alola.name: guardian-of-alola
guardian-of-alola.flavor_text: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.

soul-stealing-7-star-strike.name: soul-stealing-7-star-strike
soul-stealing-7-star-strike.flavor_text: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Marshadow, punches and kicks the target consecutively with full force.

stoked-sparksurfer.name: stoked-sparksurfer
stoked-sparksurfer.flavor_text: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu, attacks the target with full force. This move leaves the target with paralysis.

pulverizing-pancake.name: pulverizing-pancake
pulverizing-pancake.flavor_text: Z-Power brings out the true capabilities of the user, Snorlax. The Pokémon moves its enormous body energetically and attacks the target with full force.

extreme-evoboost.name: extreme-evoboost
extreme-evoboost.flavor_text: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets energy from its evolved friends and boosts its stats sharply.

genesis-supernova.name: genesis-supernova
genesis-supernova.flavor_text: Grazie al Potere Z, Mew attacca il bersaglio con tutta la sua forza e genera un Campo Psichico a terra.

shell-trap.name: shell-trap
shell-trap.flavor_text: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on the opposing Pokémon.

fleur-cannon.name: fleur-cannon
fleur-cannon.flavor_text: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

psychic-fangs.name: psychic-fangs
psychic-fangs.flavor_text: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.

stomping-tantrum.name: stomping-tantrum
stomping-tantrum.flavor_text: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

shadow-bone.name: shadow-bone
shadow-bone.flavor_text: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

accelerock.name: accelerock
accelerock.flavor_text: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

liquidation.name: liquidation
liquidation.flavor_text: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

prismatic-laser.name: prismatic-laser
prismatic-laser.flavor_text: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.

spectral-thief.name: spectral-thief
spectral-thief.flavor_text: The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.

sunsteel-strike.name: sunsteel-strike
sunsteel-strike.flavor_text: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target  regardless of its Abilities.

moongeist-beam.name: moongeist-beam
moongeist-beam.flavor_text: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of  its Abilities.

tearful-look.name: tearful-look
tearful-look.flavor_text: Chi la usa guarda il bersaglio con gli occhi pieni di lacrime e gli fa perdere lo spirito combattivo, riducendone l’Attacco e l’Attacco Speciale.

zing-zap.name: zing-zap
zing-zap.flavor_text: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

natures-madness.name: natures-madness
natures-madness.flavor_text: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target’s HP.

multi-attack.name: multi-attack
multi-attack.flavor_text: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the target. The memory held determines the move’s type.

10-000-000-volt-thunderbolt.name: 10-000-000-volt-thunderbolt
10-000-000-volt-thunderbolt.flavor_text: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it. Critical hits land more easily.

mind-blown.name: mind-blown
mind-blown.flavor_text: The user attacks everything around it by causing its own head to explode. This also damages the user.

plasma-fists.name: plasma-fists
plasma-fists.flavor_text: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

photon-geyser.name: photon-geyser
photon-geyser.flavor_text: The user attacks a target with a pillar of light. This move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever stat is higher for the user.

light-that-burns-the-sky.name: light-that-burns-the-sky
light-that-burns-the-sky.flavor_text: This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage— whichever stat is higher for the user, Necrozma.  This move ignores the target’s Ability.

searing-sunraze-smash.name: searing-sunraze-smash
searing-sunraze-smash.flavor_text: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Solgaleo, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.

menacing-moonraze-maelstrom.name: menacing-moonraze-maelstrom
menacing-moonraze-maelstrom.flavor_text: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lunala, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.

lets-snuggle-forever.name: lets-snuggle-forever
lets-snuggle-forever.flavor_text: Grazie al Potere Z, Mimikyu fa appello a tutte le sue forze e attacca il bersaglio tempestandolo di colpi.

splintered-stormshards.name: splintered-stormshards
splintered-stormshards.flavor_text: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lycanroc, attacks the target with full force. This move negates the effect on the battlefield.

clangorous-soulblaze.name: clangorous-soulblaze
clangorous-soulblaze.flavor_text: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o, attacks the opposing Pokémon with full force. This move boosts the user’s stats.

zippy-zap.name: zippy-zap
zippy-zap.flavor_text: The user attacks the target with bursts of electricity at high speed. This move always goes first and results in a critical hit.

splishy-splash.name: splishy-splash
splishy-splash.flavor_text: The user charges a huge wave with electricity and hits the opposing Pokémon with the wave. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon with paralysis.

floaty-fall.name: floaty-fall
floaty-fall.flavor_text: The user floats in the air, and then dives at a steep angle to attack the target. This may also make the target flinch.

pika-papow.name: pika-papow
pika-papow.flavor_text: The more Pikachu loves its Trainer, the greater the move’s power. It never misses.

bouncy-bubble.name: bouncy-bubble
bouncy-bubble.flavor_text: The user attacks by shooting water bubbles at the target. It then absorbs water and restores its HP by half the damage taken by the target.

buzzy-buzz.name: buzzy-buzz
buzzy-buzz.flavor_text: The user shoots a jolt of electricity to attack the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

sizzly-slide.name: sizzly-slide
sizzly-slide.flavor_text: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This also leaves the target with a burn.

glitzy-glow.name: glitzy-glow
glitzy-glow.flavor_text: The user bombards the target with telekinetic force. A wondrous wall of light is put up to weaken the power of the opposing Pokémon’s special moves.

baddy-bad.name: baddy-bad
baddy-bad.flavor_text: The user acts bad and attacks the target. A wondrous wall of light is put up to weaken the power of the opposing Pokémon’s physical moves.

sappy-seed.name: sappy-seed
sappy-seed.flavor_text: The user grows a gigantic stalk that scatters seeds to attack the target. The seeds drain the target’s HP every turn.

freezy-frost.name: freezy-frost
freezy-frost.flavor_text: The user attacks with a crystal made of cold frozen haze. It eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

sparkly-swirl.name: sparkly-swirl
sparkly-swirl.flavor_text: The user attacks the target by wrapping it with a whirlwind of an overpowering scent. This also heals all status conditions of the user’s party.

veevee-volley.name: veevee-volley
veevee-volley.flavor_text: The more Eevee loves its Trainer, the greater the move’s power. It never misses.

double-iron-bash.name: double-iron-bash
double-iron-bash.flavor_text: The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, and then strikes with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.

max-guard.name: max-guard
max-guard.flavor_text: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

dynamax-cannon.name: dynamax-cannon
dynamax-cannon.flavor_text: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

snipe-shot.name: snipe-shot
snipe-shot.flavor_text: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

jaw-lock.name: jaw-lock
jaw-lock.flavor_text: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

stuff-cheeks.name: stuff-cheeks
stuff-cheeks.flavor_text: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply raises its Defense stat.

no-retreat.name: no-retreat
no-retreat.flavor_text: This move raises all the user’s stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.

tar-shot.name: tar-shot
tar-shot.flavor_text: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target’s Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.

magic-powder.name: magic-powder
magic-powder.flavor_text: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target to Psychic type.

dragon-darts.name: dragon-darts
dragon-darts.flavor_text: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two targets, this move hits each target once.

teatime.name: teatime
teatime.flavor_text: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

octolock.name: octolock
octolock.flavor_text: The user locks the target in and prevents it from fleeing. This move also lowers the target’s Defense and Sp. Def every turn.

bolt-beak.name: bolt-beak
bolt-beak.flavor_text: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

fishious-rend.name: fishious-rend
fishious-rend.flavor_text: The user rends the target with its hard gills. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

court-change.name: court-change
court-change.flavor_text: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

max-flare.name: max-flare
max-flare.flavor_text: This is a Fire-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user intensifies the sun for five turns.

max-flutterby.name: max-flutterby
max-flutterby.flavor_text: This is a Bug-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

max-lightning.name: max-lightning
max-lightning.flavor_text: This is an Electric-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns.

max-strike.name: max-strike
max-strike.flavor_text: This is a Normal-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Speed stat.

max-knuckle.name: max-knuckle
max-knuckle.flavor_text: This is a Fighting-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Attack stats.

max-phantasm.name: max-phantasm
max-phantasm.flavor_text: This is a Ghost-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Defense stat.

max-hailstorm.name: max-hailstorm
max-hailstorm.flavor_text: This is an Ice-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns.

max-ooze.name: max-ooze
max-ooze.flavor_text: This is a Poison-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stats.

max-geyser.name: max-geyser
max-geyser.flavor_text: This is a Water-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns.

max-airstream.name: max-airstream
max-airstream.flavor_text: This is a Flying-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Speed stats.

max-starfall.name: max-starfall
max-starfall.flavor_text: This is a Fairy-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Misty Terrain for five turns.

max-wyrmwind.name: max-wyrmwind
max-wyrmwind.flavor_text: This is a Dragon-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Attack stat.

max-mindstorm.name: max-mindstorm
max-mindstorm.flavor_text: This is a Psychic-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Psychic Terrain for five turns.

max-rockfall.name: max-rockfall
max-rockfall.flavor_text: This is a Rock-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a sandstorm lasting five turns.

max-quake.name: max-quake
max-quake.flavor_text: This is a Ground-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Sp. Def stats.

max-darkness.name: max-darkness
max-darkness.flavor_text: This is a Dark-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

max-overgrowth.name: max-overgrowth
max-overgrowth.flavor_text: This is a Grass-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns.

max-steelspike.name: max-steelspike
max-steelspike.flavor_text: This is a Steel-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This raises ally Pokémon’s Defense stats.

clangorous-soul.name: clangorous-soul
clangorous-soul.flavor_text: The user raises all its stats by using some of its HP.

body-press.name: body-press
body-press.flavor_text: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user’s Defense, the more damage it can inflict on the target.

decorate.name: decorate
decorate.flavor_text: The user sharply raises the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.

drum-beating.name: drum-beating
drum-beating.flavor_text: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum’s roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

snap-trap.name: snap-trap
snap-trap.flavor_text: The user snares the target in a snap trap for four to five turns.

pyro-ball.name: pyro-ball
pyro-ball.flavor_text: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

behemoth-blade.name: behemoth-blade
behemoth-blade.flavor_text: The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

behemoth-bash.name: behemoth-bash
behemoth-bash.flavor_text: The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into the target. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

aura-wheel.name: aura-wheel
aura-wheel.flavor_text: Morpeko attacks and raises its Speed with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move’s type changes depending on the user’s form.

breaking-swipe.name: breaking-swipe
breaking-swipe.flavor_text: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

branch-poke.name: branch-poke
branch-poke.flavor_text: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

overdrive.name: overdrive
overdrive.flavor_text: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

apple-acid.name: apple-acid
apple-acid.flavor_text: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

grav-apple.name: grav-apple
grav-apple.flavor_text: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

spirit-break.name: spirit-break
spirit-break.flavor_text: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target’s spirit. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

strange-steam.name: strange-steam
strange-steam.flavor_text: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.

life-dew.name: life-dew
life-dew.flavor_text: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon in the battle.

obstruct.name: obstruct
obstruct.flavor_text: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession. Direct contact harshly lowers the attacker’s Defense stat.

false-surrender.name: false-surrender
false-surrender.flavor_text: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

meteor-assault.name: meteor-assault
meteor-assault.flavor_text: The user attacks wildly with its thick leek. The user can’t move on the next turn, because the force of this move makes it stagger.

eternabeam.name: eternabeam
eternabeam.flavor_text: This is Eternatus’s most powerful attack in its original form. The user can’t move on the next turn.

steel-beam.name: steel-beam
steel-beam.flavor_text: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.

expanding-force.name: expanding-force
expanding-force.flavor_text: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. This move’s power goes up and damages all opposing Pokémon on Psychic Terrain.

steel-roller.name: steel-roller
steel-roller.flavor_text: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails when the ground hasn’t turned into a terrain.

scale-shot.name: scale-shot
scale-shot.flavor_text: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user’s Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.

meteor-beam.name: meteor-beam
meteor-beam.flavor_text: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers space power and boosts its Sp. Atk stat, then attacks the target on the next turn.

shell-side-arm.name: shell-side-arm
shell-side-arm.flavor_text: This move inflicts physical or special damage, whichever will be more effective. This may also poison the target.

misty-explosion.name: misty-explosion
misty-explosion.flavor_text: The user attacks everything around it and faints upon using this move. This move’s power is increased on Misty Terrain.

grassy-glide.name: grassy-glide
grassy-glide.flavor_text: Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target. This move always goes first on Grassy Terrain.

rising-voltage.name: rising-voltage
rising-voltage.flavor_text: The user attacks with electric voltage rising from the ground. This move’s power doubles when the target is on Electric Terrain.

terrain-pulse.name: terrain-pulse
terrain-pulse.flavor_text: The user utilizes the power of the terrain to attack. This move’s type and power changes depending on the terrain when it’s used.

skitter-smack.name: skitter-smack
skitter-smack.flavor_text: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

burning-jealousy.name: burning-jealousy
burning-jealousy.flavor_text: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.

lash-out.name: lash-out
lash-out.flavor_text: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. If the user’s stats were lowered during this turn, the power of this move is doubled.

poltergeist.name: poltergeist
poltergeist.flavor_text: The user attacks the target by controlling the target’s item. The move fails if the target doesn’t have an item.

corrosive-gas.name: corrosive-gas
corrosive-gas.flavor_text: The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items they hold.

coaching.name: coaching
coaching.flavor_text: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.

flip-turn.name: flip-turn
flip-turn.flavor_text: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

triple-axel.name: triple-axel
triple-axel.flavor_text: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

dual-wingbeat.name: dual-wingbeat
dual-wingbeat.flavor_text: The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.

scorching-sands.name: scorching-sands
scorching-sands.flavor_text: The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack. This may also leave the target with a burn.

jungle-healing.name: jungle-healing
jungle-healing.flavor_text: The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and healing any status conditions of itself and its ally Pokémon in battle.

wicked-blow.name: wicked-blow
wicked-blow.flavor_text: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

surging-strikes.name: surging-strikes
surging-strikes.flavor_text: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This attack always results in a critical hit.

thunder-cage.name: thunder-cage
thunder-cage.flavor_text: The user traps the target in a cage of sparking electricity for four to five turns.

dragon-energy.name: dragon-energy
dragon-energy.flavor_text: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.

freezing-glare.name: freezing-glare
freezing-glare.flavor_text: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.

fiery-wrath.name: fiery-wrath
fiery-wrath.flavor_text: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.

thunderous-kick.name: thunderous-kick
thunderous-kick.flavor_text: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

glacial-lance.name: glacial-lance
glacial-lance.flavor_text: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

astral-barrage.name: astral-barrage
astral-barrage.flavor_text: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.
